snippet: Two rivals in the Middle East share a similar concern about Iranian interests, and have quietly exchanged intelligence about Iran for years.
abstract: Former Saudi government adviser Anwar Eshki and former Israeli United Nations ambassador Dore Gold discuss Iran's actions across Middle East at Washington office of the Council on Foreign Relations.
lead_paragraph: Two rivals in the Middle East share a similar concern about Iranian interests, and have quietly exchanged intelligence about Iran for years.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia and Israel Share a Common Opposition
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia and Israel Share a Stage
